reviews.review:
I have to say that I really like this game. My hours playing are low due to the fact that to me this is a Halloween game and that is when I play. I'm on the fence about recommending it though as this is multiplayer and like most they have cheaters....the other main complaint of mine has been the match making time to get a match,

The best part to me is playing the killer and losing....I get to chase people and try to scare them while giving them a quick little horror story that they star in.  It's like being the director of a horror movie and manipulating things and of course there will always be the odd death that happens. 

All in all it's a fun game and if they clean up the cheats and make the lobby match making work better it would be a top lister for me.
Good game to play with friends full of funny moments and jumpscares at times.

O jogo em si é muito bom ,tendo vários pontos positivos como: o sistema de jogabilidade,os gráficos dos senarios e assasinos , o sistema de compras dos assassinos e sobreviventes  e cosméticos para os personagens.
Mas com toda via o jogo tem alguns problemas como : bugs , erros de conexão, queda de frames e principalmente o fato da demora para achar "sobreviventes" quando iniciado a partida como "assasino" cujo as vezes é imposivel.
Bom tirando os pontos negativos como nota final eu dou a este jogo como super recomendado, divertido  e não enjoar fácil.

The game itself it's awesome, but the community can be toxic as hell...In fact, be prepared to face campers, tunnelers, and if playing as killer, don't be upset if you see survivors that will teabag when they stun you or are near an opened gate...
The devs are great and they re doing a "pretty good job" , content is being added almost every week so, I would say yes for this game!

Buenas como usuario de play y pc os recomiendo el juego puesto que me lo descargue en la play al estar gratis y me lo e comprado tambien para pc, llevaba tiempo observandolo y ahora esta muy bien a excepcion de una sola cosa para mi gusto el sistema de emparejamiento es nefasto especialmente en multiplayer y con esto me refiero a amigos, individual va relativamente bien depende del nivel de clasificatoria pero el resto delas opciones repito que es si no el peor juego que he visto seguro esta entre los 3 mas malos que he probado espero lo resuelvan pronto porque hecha a perder a un monton de jugadores que queremos disfrutar con este juego.
UN SALUDO.
pretty good job so far
game is very balanced around now... a good time to jump in, although que times for killers are about 5-10 minutes
Trash
We did a pretty good job so far

切断が多すぎてゲームにならない。
マッチ開始時にサバイバーが4人揃っていない、ということは前からちょくちょくあったのだが、
近頃はゲーム中の、故意による切断が横行している。（ダウンさせられた瞬間に切断、など明らかに故意のもの）
たまにならまだ我慢はできるものの、3試合に1回は切断に遭遇するほどの頻度なので、
切断によるなんらかのペナルティを早急に講じてもらわないと正直オンラインゲームとして楽しむことができない。
ゲーム内容としては、キラーとしてゲームに参加した時の一試合の長さがネック。
時間制限がないのがマイナスに働いていて、終盤ハッチ戦になった時ゲームを終わらせたくても
キラー側から能動的に試合を終わらせることができないのは致命的な欠陥だと思う。
また、パーティとのマッチングやVCも開発側が問題視しているのなら、それはゲーム側で対処すべきことであって、
プレイヤー側の善意に任せるものではない。
単にパーティとのマッチを許可するか、そうでないかをこちらで指定できるようにすればいいだけであると思う。
とにかくゲーム自体は楽しめるのに、オンラインゲームとしての環境が整っていないのが残念。
Amazing game to play solo or with friends!
Das spiel ist nur für den Killer. Je höher man kommt desto mehr wird am Haken gecampt und getunnelt. Kack Spiel

dead by daylight es un buen juego al que eres un asesino que tiene que colgar a otros cuatro supervivientes en unos ganchos y si eres un superviviente tienes que reparar unos generadores en total 5 y despues  abrir una puerta para escapar

muy bueno pero seria bueno que los asesino no tuvieran tanta ventaja respecto a los supervivientes cuando al partir son menos de 4

сервера говно что придумали. хиты попадают в тебя через километры. посик идет очень долга. а если ты играешь против охотницы то вообще хочется проста удалить игру и не когда не играть в нее. потому что еще топоры попадают в тебя через препятствия даже если сам манн не на мерин использовать баг этот, или за километер. игра была лучше без этих серверов что приставка для тетриса роботает лудше чем они.

So sehr wie ich dieses Spiel liebe, mag ich es auch oft nicht, aber nicht unbedingt wegen dem Spiel an sich, sondern es liegt an den Leuten die dieses Spiel spielen unnd wie manche es spielen. Das macht es oft sehr nervig. Aber ansonsten für mich das beste Multiplayer-Spiel was genau meinen Geschmack treffen tut.

Затягивает просто дико, порекомендовала подруга с всего 6-тью часами игры, что уже дало немалые надежды, большинство из которых оправдались. Первое время испытывался настоящий, невероятно дикий страх, ну или может это я такая пугливая х) 
Хотя даже сейчас, когда с помощью стримеров дбд, познаны многие тонкости, когда уже не ссышь ходить постоянно на кортах и бывает весело побесить убийцу, чиня генер в начале катки жопу всё же жмёт. 
Нашли кого-то другого — отпускает, нашли первым тебя — ты убегаешь крутя бошкой на все 360 и высматриваешь палетки с окнами.

В общем, отличная игра, конечно не без известных и смешных багов, которые вызваны в большинстве случаев из-за пинга, но пинг это дела лишь твоего интернета и места проживания (и того, что ты можешь спокойно ливнуть из лобби если пинг выше 200)

А так же не без идиотов в игре, которые попадаються в 60% случаев! (Процент так же зависит от ранга)

сурвам убрали всё возможность слепить фонариками спасать даже сука палетки и окна убрали как и перк дед храд и спринт  как мы наблюдаем получаем обосаную игру которой два года и из которой ушел 72hrs итд про нового маньяка он не сбалансирован как и перки и карта уже тотемы нелья ломать супер разрабы постарались на *ура* просто обосаный проект в котором остались только кемперы токсики и тунелеры и еще далбаёбы на первом ранге которые не умеют чинить генераторы взрвать 3 раза подряд геник на 1-вом ранге еще кокието обосаные эмблэмы которые хуй знает как работают их каждый раз перерабатывают игра стала помойкой для токсиков и кемперов вот и .

Al principio me parecia un videojuego estilo Arcade con mecanicas básicas para echarle un par de horas. Con el paso del tiempo, he descubierto lo complejo que es Dead by Daylight y como cada partida es diferente, además, me encanta el sistema de progresión, el cual requiere muchas horas y ser eficaz en las partidas. Desde luego he de destacar el sistema de habilidades/perks que posee, es simplemente increible. 
Si hay algo que me molesta de Dead by Daylight, son a veces los tiempos de espera y la gente tóxica, a destacar los asesinos que se dedican a tunelear y a campear, pero nada es perfecto.

В начале боялся, прятался, сидел в шкафу до ворон, вздрагивал при внезапного удара мана без террора, потом понеслось... провоцировать мана чтоб побегать от него и в начале в большинстве случаев, отдыхал на крюке)

Co dodat, po 1000 hodinách přišlo na to to asi zrecenzovat.

Ze začátku z takřka nehratelný hry se stala tahle slátanina. Dnes to má jisté mouchy, ale která hra nemá že. Po pár hodinách solo možná přestane bavit, ale hra s přáteli a random naplaveninou je Jazda. Po X hodinách v tom už vidíte nedostatky v podobě hon na geny a brány. Nový obsah tuto hru vždy oživí na několik dalších hodin. Jsem rád, že vývojáři začli být aktivní a není to jako z prva, kdy jsem se dočkali po půl roce něčeho nového, ano eventy nebyly. Ted už se to docela rozjíždí, ale trochu mi přijde, že je to vymrdávání s věrnými a stálými hráči. Ty odměny jsou nic moc a nedostanete ani nic za rank v sezoně, která se vždy restartuje. Hru hodně doporučuji pro Coop, ale na solo play to je hra jen na pár hodin. Celkově nebudu Zmrd a dávám 8/10 DuD

Bug, matchmaking veloce ma spesso abbastanza discutibile, grafica migliorabile ed ha anche dei difetti =). Si può dire però che queste "ACCORTEZZE" sono sì migliorabili ma in fin fine anche trascurabili. Il gameplay originale d'altronde oscura tutti i problemi che si presentano sul gioco, infatti non ha rivali nel campo ( Friday the 13th : The Game sarà pur carino di grafica ma dalla parte sua ha un gameplay bruttino con killer OP ( unico killer ), mappe tutte uguali o simili, fattore killer/survivor random...).
Insomma il titolo è stato ben pensato, la community è molto simpatica ( tranne qualche caso ma vabbè certi "soggetti" li trovi su tutti i giochi ) e si può giocare tranquillamente sia con che senza i vostri amici, ovviamente diventerà più piacevole nel primo caso. Continui aggiornamenti stimolano sempre di più i player, compreso il sottoscritto , è infatti un esempio di uno di quei giochi che invecchia ma non si impolvera, per intenderci. Felice di aver comprato il gioco ( ormai quasi un anno fa ) e questo lo dimostrano le mie ore.

Игра очень захватывает в начале, но после получения 1 ранга начинает наскучивать, играешь в основном после обнов или в ивенты, но для любителей нарядить своего перса, тут просто шикарные наряды. Если у тебя железные нервы и приятная компания, то можешь спокойно наслаждаться игрой)

100% recommend this game to anyone looking for something like this.
I started playing after I saw Jacksepticeye and Markiplier playing it, so I downloaded it back before all the DLC after the huntress started coming out. 

It's a lot scarier than you think because things happen so unexpectedly, and every game you play is different. Being the killer is a lot harder than you think it is when you're first starting out, but it provides a good challenge which is always a really good characteristic to have in a game.

My sister and I regularly play together. I only have 115 hours on record due to not playing in a long while after FNAF came out, but my sister has nearly 1k hours and is incredibly good at it. We have a good giggle playing this game.

The only negative thing, I think, is how OP some of the killers seem. I know a lot of stuff got nerfed after the initial release, but some of the stuff does still make a couple of them seem pretty OP compared to the survivors or even other killers. But I digress.

I would 110% recommend this to anyone who is wondering about it. Love this game a lot.

Le pourrait etre sympa....si....

1 : les Devs corrigeaient les bugs au lieu de sortir des personnages à outrance
2 : Qu'ils arretent d'écouter les Kevins qui ne joue que tueur et qui se plaignent des qu'il n'arrivent pas à touché un survivant qui prend une ou deux fenetre et une palette en prime...

Ce qui en résulte est simple , trouvé une game en surviant : 15 seconde ; trouver une game en jouant tueur : 5 minute à une demi heure c'est navrant au moins le jeu Friday 13 avait deja palier le probleme en mettant les joueurs ensemble et choisissant le tueur au hasard.

Bref l'équilibrage du jeu est vraiment au fraise est les devs ne fond rien pour arranger les chose....a part sortir des perso pour se faire du pognon...
Clairement , le jeu encourage les tueurs à camper les survivant accroché, et meme à s'acharner sur eux une fois décroché ce qui rend les partis toute pareil, le fun disparait aussi vite que les frustration la remplace...

I am a picky buyer. I can tell you this is a good game to play casually. it doesent have a campain mode. it is pretty exiting and makes you feel as if you were actualy the one inside the game. I see in the coment section there are good and bad reviews. I mean you can buy it and if you play less than 2 hours you can get a refund within 14 of purchase, so you loose nothing trying it out.

Das Spiel macht auch nach über 300 Stunden immer noch Spaß bzw. lehrt einen immer noch das Fürchten. Ob allein oder mit Freunden im Überlebenen-modus oder unterwegs als Killer jede einzelne Runde ist ein Erlebnis. Es kommen zwar immer häufiger nervige Killer(die das Spielprinzip Jagen-Fangen -Jagen und dann Killen) noch nicht verstanden haben und leider immer mehr Camper unterwegs sind, was es für´s Überleben schwieriger macht und mann nach 2-3 solcher Runden, dann doch nervt. 
Aber das Spiel ist klasse! Die Entwickler geben sich mühe immer mehr Kontent zu bringen, sei es nun einen Neuen Killer und/oder Überlebenen zu erschaffen oder (was mich persöhnlich immer freut) neue Maps zu Gestalten.
Ich bin Gespannt was in den kommenden Jahren noch so alles Passiert.
一开始玩的时候真的是害怕，被朋友的杨永信电的尿都流出来 哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈哈

This game, While aggravating ( which it is, almost always) is quite fun and feels accomplishing on victory. 
The sad fact about this game though. Is that I don't believe it to be a solo game whatsoever, unless you plan on murdering everyone. If thats you, then I can understand. But from a mostly survivor player, this game can be almost impossible to play without good teamates. Or people that work together in the loosest form. 

This game isn't for the mentally weak. There is a lot of psychological pressure in this game that does make people act scared, or cowardly. You have to be able to take risks to win matches in this game and help others to win with you. Sure you can escape solo and let everyone else die just to boost your elo, but the point of this game has always been to survive 'together'.

Secondly. You have to be able to calm down and cool off quickly. Because you will honestly find a lot of rage inducing gameplay, or toxicity. There are face campers a plenty. Hard zone camps a dozen ( meaning not leaving 10ft from a hook), Tunnelers ( Killers that only target one player at a time exclusively and will ignore even the most agressive tempts to distract them from you) and The newest and most frequent tactic of killers. Are Slug Matches.Which in basic script means that they knock you all prone, clump you together, and either hook all of you at once, or just let you all bleed to death simultaneously, and yes there is a so called Solution to slug matches, but the chances of a killer letting someone with No Mither live are next to 0%, and Unbreakable is a one time deal. Decisive again is pretty much useless unless used by someone who is confidant with escaping. 

Very rarely will you find killers that don't abuse in game mechanics to get victories. A favorite tactic of Survivors is to Generator rush. This tactic includes everone going after a generator, and whoever gets caught distracts the killer. Sometimes it works okay. The game goes on, but a lot of times it will psychologically press the killer to using one of the above stated tactics. Sure you can report them, but you never truly know if your report made a difference or if what you consider gameplay abuse is accepted or within the strict guidelines stated. Its a grey zone. 

So yeah. Learn to cool down quickly. Or be able to take breaks from the game. Or play with friends like most of us, and try to enjoy your playtime, and rage together. It's not the best game overall, but definately one worth checking out.

As much as many people below complain about the game, the game is fun. You get to play 2 game styles which depending on your day, you may want to murder 4 survivors, or play the daring crafty game as a survivor.

There is a learning curve... like any other game. I personally liked the challenge the game initially has, you don't know the killers and every killer is frightening. Your heart races but that's ok... you get through a few games and finally learn the game.

The people aren't as toxic... usually as long as you don't camp as a killer.

Overall my only complaint is that camping isn't punished enough.

Просто классс

At its core it's a 5 player horror survival game where 4 players take on the role of survivors, and 1 player take on the role of a killer. The survivors' objective is to activate 5 generators located throughout a map and make their escape. The killers objective is, well, to kill the survivors. 

A fair word of warning is that you should either play with friends, or play the killer. Random team members usually aren't worth the headache. The community is complete garbage and is made up for the most part by special snowflakes. But if you fancy the fact that people will cry, rage and curse no matter how you play, it's THE place to be. 

Survivors in particular will go out of their way to taunt you in-game, but will spend hours flaming in the post-game chat about how "you weren't being fair" when you do manage to kill 'em. It's the sweetest thing. 

A striking 10/10. It helped me accept the fact that humanity is doomed, but it is probably for the best.

Pontos Possitivos:
- o Entreterimento do Jogo (Diversão) é bem elevada, principalmente quando jogado com amigos.
- Lobbys com Variedades de Ping (não é um server dedicado. são ''servers'' criados pelo os Assassinos.)
- Trilha sonora Assustadora e bem Feita (para os Sobreviventes a Tilha sonora é assustadora).
- Variedade de Sobreviventes e Assasinos, ainda mais com as DLCs. (Que são as minhas Favoritas)
- Poder jogar em Grupo.

Pontos Negativos :
Os pontos Negativos na minha opnião , Não é problema do Jogo , mas sim da Comunidade.
- Kid Killer (sim tem Kids que jogam este jogo...)
- Face Camper/ Camper.
- Alguns Players imaturos , que saem Exigando tudo.

Apesar deste Probleminhas, O Jogo Vale muito apena
Dead by Daylight is a very good game and for 20 euro you can do nothing wrong. The game is quite difficult at first but you get used to it. The graphics is really very good and quite deep.,

игра хорошая но есть очень мноого багов

Muy buen juego la verdad, las primeras horas parecen aburridas solo hace falta agarrarle la mano y te va a ir gustando de más y más, lo unico que cambiaria seria el campeo excesivo de algunos killers o en algunos casos el pay to win y el teaming que se puede hallar en las partidas, pero por lo demas muy buen juego entretenido y con una comunidad no tan toxica :D
Un jeu qui parait répétitf et dont pourtant on ne se lasse pas. On ajoute à ça du nouveau contenu solide et ponctuel et on obtient ce bon jeu que je recommande.
